pages.text: $(c:/ftbquests open_book 4AF5F24C4B770EA5)&c$(l)---> Open Quest Page <--- $(/c)$(br)&rFinding it difficult to survive?$(2br)&eSpice of Life: Onion Edition &rgives every food a &e'diversity'&r factor. Eating diverse foods gives &ebenefits,&r while sticking to a few foods won't. &eCheck your Food Book in your MineMenu (default: H)&r to check your diversity and current benefits.

&eKeep eating different foods and increase your Health, Block Reach, Movement Speed, and more!&rThe &eLunchbag&r can be crafted and upgraded to &ehold all your food&r at once by &eshift right clicking&r with it in hand and right clicking to eat with it.
